data.title: 2010 Photoions, Photoionization and Photodetachment Conference GRC
data.meta_description: The 2010 Gordon Research Conference on Photoions, Photoionization and Photodetachment will be held in Galveston, Texas. Apply today to reserve your spot.
data.text:
